item.title: Chitãozinho & Xororó - Pura Emoção
item.description:
Achy Breaky Heart by Billy Ray Cyrus. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: F & C (or F & C7)
SAME SONG IN C (using C and G or G7): https://youtu.be/Mvx_NsalPkY
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Lil Nas X - Old Town Road
Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Am, Em, F, G7, D7
As performed by Percy Sliedge
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/_iXuaXJSGns
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Background (modified to look like Taylor Swift's "Lover" album cover) is from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Sudha - Wendeyaho
item.description:
Wendeyaho (We n’ de ya ho), also known as the Cherokee Morning Song, by Sudha. A rough translation is: I am of the great spirit, yes I am. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner musicians can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, G
Across the USA many states are changing “Columbus Day” to an observance of “Indigenous Peoples' Day”. This is a perfect song for students to play in October, or anytime of the year.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Kodaline - All I Want
item.description:
Ukulele play along
All I Want - Kodaline
Using the chords: Am C Dm F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU (fast)
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Huey Lewis & The News - Stuck With You
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of C & D.
Chords Used: C, Am7, F, Dm, G, Am, Em, A, D, Bm7
As performed by Huey Lewis and the News.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/FaNEwVl1sR0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Free Bird
item.description:
Free Bird by Lynyrd Skynyrd. For educational use. The lyrics video was created by YouTuber Anna Mintz and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKLJdmR6UGU, I just added the ukulele chords. Chords Used: G, D, Em, F, C (and Bb, but only during the bridge / guitar solo).

item.title: Blanco Brown - The Git Up
item.description:
The Git Up by Blanco Brown. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones to the key of C so beginner instruments can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C (c,e,g) & F (f,a,c). If playing chords by note, the “D” and “B” notes are never used.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: RoadTrip - No No No
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
No No No - RoadTrip
Using the chords: Am C F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
This one is a special shout out to Sian & Maddy, 2 of The Ukulaliens most loyal members. Enjoy!
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
